类的使用
com.whaleal.mars.core.index.IndexBuilder

  • 使用IndexBuilder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.whaleal.mars.core.index  

    • com.whaleal.mars.core.index中IndexBuilder的使用

      返回IndexBuilder的com.whaleal.mars.core.index中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder IndexBuilder.background(boolean background)
      Create the index in the background
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder IndexBuilder.fields(Field... fields) 
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder IndexBuilder.fields(List<Field> fields) 
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder IndexBuilder.name(String name)
      The name of the index to create; default is to let the mongodb create a name (in the form of key1_1/-1_key2_1/-1...)
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder IndexBuilder.options(IndexOptions options)
      Options to apply to the index.
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder IndexBuilder.sparse(boolean sparse)
      Create the index with the sparse option
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder IndexBuilder.unique(boolean unique)
      Creates the index as a unique value index; inserting duplicates values in this field will cause errors
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder IndexBuilder.value(String value)
      List of fields (prepended with "-" for desc; defaults to asc).
